site.title: Data Request
site.description: Use this page to request data and get transparent updates on your ticket!

translation.header: Tell us what you data you need
translation.description_line1: We are committed to fulfilling your requirements via our portal.
translation.description_line2: Use this page to request data and get transparent updates on your ticket!
translation.search_query_placeholder: Search by dataset title or with 'id: 1'

status.under_review_modal: This request is being processed. The status will be updated here once there is an update. Stay tuned!
status.rejected_modal: This request has been rejected for the following reason

request_modal.title: Request data
request_modal.subtitle: Fill in the form below:
request_modal.subtitle_subscribe: Interested with the development of this ticket? Submit this form below to get email notification(s) regarding this ticket.
request_modal.success_description: You can check the data request tickets below for update.
request_modal.success_description_subscribe: You will receive email(s) whenever there is an update to this ticket.

success_modal.title: The data you requested is now live!
success_modal.subtitle: Check out the following data catalogue entries:

forms.name: Name
forms.dataset_description_placeholder: Describe the dataset that you are requesting
forms.purpose_placeholder: Give a short explanation on how you're planning to use this dataset
